title: interceptor bound to a non-RestClient method on a RestClient interface is not called with RestClient Reactive
body:
### Describe the bug

Say I use RestClient Reactive and have this RestClient interface:

```java
@RegisterRestClient(baseUri = "http://localhost:8080")
public interface HelloClient {
    @GET
    @Path("/hello")
    Uni<String> hello();

    @CircuitBreaker(requestVolumeThreshold = 2, failureRatio = 0.5, delay = 1000)
    default CompletionStage<String> helloWithCB() {
        return hello().subscribeAsCompletionStage();
    }
}
```

(Why don't I put the `@CircuitBreaker` directly on the `hello` method? As you may imagine from one returning `Uni` and the other returning `CompletionStage`, this is an attempt to workaround a Fault Tolerance problem. Even if it wasn't, this code is perfectly legal and should work just fine, in my opinion.)

Then, if I `@Inject HelloClient` somewhere and call `helloWithCB()`, the interceptor (Fault Tolerance interceptor in this case) is not called. The invocation goes straight to the `helloWithCB` method.

This is because when generating a RestClient `CDIWrapper` class from the interface, only RestClient methods (`hello()` in this case) are overridden (and their annotations are copied to the class). A `default` method in particular is never overridden, and since interceptor bindings are only "inherited" from superclasses, not from interfaces, the interceptor bound to the `default` method is never called.

### Expected behavior

Interceptors on `default` methods of RestClient interfaces are called.

### Actual behavior

Interceptors on `default` methods of RestClient interfaces are _not_ called.

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux argondie 4.15.0-162-generic #170-Ubuntu SMP Mon Oct 18 11:38:05 UTC 2021 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "11.0.11" 2021-04-20 OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 11.0.11+9-Ubuntu-0ubuntu2.18.04) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 11.0.11+9-Ubuntu-0ubuntu2.18.04, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

N/A

### Quarkus version or git rev

a3bf3cb65dd4c5d24da33c6bc7b4546acc031de3

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.1 (05c21c65bdfed0f71a2f2ada8b84da59348c4c5d) Maven home: /home/lthon/software/apache-maven Java version: 1.8.0_292, vendor: Private Build, runtime: /usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64/jre Default locale: cs_CZ, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "linux", version: "4.15.0-162-generic", arch: "amd64", family: "unix"

### Additional information
